Renderer.1 {
}

Renderer.2 {
    BackgroundColor = transparent;
    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
    TextColor = white;
    TextOutlineColor = black;
    TextOutlineThickness = 2;
    TextureBackground = None;
}

Renderer.3 {
    Texture = "../textures/modules/NONE.png" Smooth;
    TransparentTexture = false;
}

Renderer.4 {
    BackgroundColor = transparent;
    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
    TextColor = white;
    TextOutlineColor = black;
    TextOutlineThickness = 1;
    TextureBackground = None;
}

Group.InterfaceGroup {
    Position = (50% - 330, 100% - 80);
    Renderer = &1;
    Size = (660, 80);

    Picture.Bonus {
        Position = (6%, 12%);
        Renderer = &3;
        Size = (9.09091%, 75%);
    }

    Picture.GunImage {
        Position = (15.3%, 12%);
        Renderer = &3;
        Size = (9.09091%, 75%);
    }

    Picture.LeftModule {
        Position = (75.7%, 12%);
        Renderer = &3;
        Size = (9.09091%, 75%);
    }

    Picture.RightModule {
        Position = (85%, 12%);
        Renderer = &3;
        Size = (9.09091%, 75%);
    }

    ProgressBar.HPBar {
        Maximum = 100;
        Minimum = 0;
        Position = (30.5%, 15%);
        Size = (39.1%, 24%);
        TextSize = 13;
        Value = 50;

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = #2C272890;
            BorderColor = black;
            Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
            FillColor = red;
            TextColor = white;
            TextColorFilled = black;
            TextureBackground = None;
            TextureFill = None;
        }
    }

    ProgressBar.StaminaBar {
        Maximum = 100;
        Minimum = 0;
        Position = (30.5%, 39%);
        Size = (39.1%, 24%);
        TextSize = 13;
        Value = 0;

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = #2C272890;
            BorderColor = black;
            Borders = (0, 1, 0, 1);
            FillColor = #FFF92B;
            TextColor = white;
            TextColorFilled = black;
            TextureBackground = None;
            TextureFill = None;
        }
    }

    ProgressBar.EnergyBar {
        Maximum = 100;
        Minimum = 0;
        Position = (30.5%, 63%);
        Size = (39.1%, 24%);
        TextSize = 13;
        Value = 75;

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = #2C272890;
            BorderColor = black;
            Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
            FillColor = #006EFF;
            TextColor = white;
            TextColorFilled = black;
            TextureBackground = None;
            TextureFill = None;
        }
    }

    Label.BonusTip {
        AutoSize = true;
        Position = (10.5455%, 12%);
        Size = (25, 33);
        Text = Q;
        TextSize = 25;

        Renderer {
            TextColor = white;
            TextOutlineColor = black;
            TextOutlineThickness = 2;
            TextureBackground = None;

            Scrollbar {
                ArrowBackgroundColor = rgba(160, 160, 160, 215);
                ArrowBackgroundColorHover = rgba(170, 170, 170, 215);
                ArrowColor = rgba(200, 200, 200, 215);
                ArrowColorHover = rgba(225, 225, 225, 215);
                ThumbColor = rgba(185, 185, 185, 215);
                ThumbColorHover = rgba(195, 195, 195, 215);
                TrackColor = rgba(160, 160, 160, 215);
                TrackColorHover = rgba(170, 170, 170, 215);
            }
        }
    }

    Label.LeftModuleTip {
        AutoSize = true;
        Position = (80.2455%, 12%);
        Size = (25, 33);
        Text = Q;
        TextSize = 25;

        Renderer {
            BorderColor = #F1F8FF;
            Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
            TextColor = rgba(255, 255, 255, 215);
            TextOutlineColor = black;
            TextOutlineThickness = 2;
            TextureBackground = None;

            Scrollbar {
                ArrowBackgroundColor = rgba(160, 160, 160, 215);
                ArrowBackgroundColorHover = rgba(170, 170, 170, 215);
                ArrowColor = rgba(200, 200, 200, 215);
                ArrowColorHover = rgba(225, 225, 225, 215);
                ThumbColor = rgba(185, 185, 185, 215);
                ThumbColorHover = rgba(195, 195, 195, 215);
                TrackColor = rgba(160, 160, 160, 215);
                TrackColorHover = rgba(170, 170, 170, 215);
            }
        }
    }

    Label.RightModuleTip {
        AutoSize = true;
        Position = (89.5455%, 12%);
        Size = (25, 33);
        Text = Q;
        TextSize = 25;

        Renderer {
            TextColor = rgba(255, 255, 255, 215);
            TextOutlineColor = black;
            TextOutlineThickness = 2;

            Scrollbar {
                ArrowBackgroundColor = rgba(160, 160, 160, 215);
                ArrowBackgroundColorHover = rgba(170, 170, 170, 215);
                ArrowColor = rgba(200, 200, 200, 215);

                ThumbColorHover = rgba(195, 195, 195, 215);
                TrackColor = rgba(160, 160, 160, 215);
                TrackColorHover = rgba(170, 170, 170, 215);
            }
        }
    }

    Picture.Interface {
        Size = (100%, 100%);

        Renderer {
            Texture = "../textures/new-interface.png" Smooth;
            TransparentTexture = false;
        }
    }

    Label.HPBarVal {
        HorizontalAlignment = Center;
        Position = (40%, 18%);
        Renderer = &4;
        ScrollbarPolicy = Never;
        Size = (20%, 24%);
        Text = 0;
        TextSize = 13;
    }

    Label.StaminaBarVal {
        HorizontalAlignment = Center;
        Position = (40%, 42%);
        Renderer = &4;
        ScrollbarPolicy = Never;
        Size = (20%, 24%);
        Text = 0;
        TextSize = 13;

    Label.EnergyBarVal {
        HorizontalAlignment = Center;
        Position = (40%, 64%);
        Renderer = &4;
        ScrollbarPolicy = Never;
        Size = (20%, 24%);
        Text = 0;
        TextSize = 13;
    }
}

Label.RespawnInfo {
    HorizontalAlignment = Center;
    Position = (25%, 45%);
    Size = (50%, 10%);
    Text = "Press R to respawn";
    TextSize = 30;
    VerticalAlignment = Center;
    Visible = false;

    Renderer {
        BackgroundColor = transparent;
        BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
        Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
        Opacity = 1;
        TextColor = white;
        TextOutlineColor = black;
        TextOutlineThickness = 2;
        TextureBackground = None;
    }
}
